an6.49:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.49:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca khemo āyasmā ca sumano sāvatthiyaṃ viharanti andhavanasmiṃ.
an6.49:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā ca khemo āyasmā ca sumano yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā khemo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.49:2.1: “Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto tassa na evaṃ hoti:
an6.49:2.2: ‘atthi me seyyoti vā atthi me sadisoti vā atthi me hīnoti vā’”ti.
an6.49:2.5: Atha kho āyasmā khemo “samanuñño me satthā”ti uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an6.49:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā sumano acirapakkante āyasmante kheme bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.49:3.2: “yo so, bhante, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto tassa na evaṃ hoti:
an6.49:3.3: ‘natthi me seyyoti vā natthi me sadisoti vā natthi me hīnoti vā’”ti.
an6.49:3.6: Atha kho āyasmā sumano “samanuñño me satthā”ti uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an6.49:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantesu āyasmante ca kheme āyasmante ca sumane bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.49:4.3: Attho ca vutto attā ca anupanīto.
an6.49:4.4: Atha ca pana idhekacce moghapurisā hasamānakā maññe aññaṃ byākaronti.
